a1: Germany needs to play smarter. not harder.
q2: Would you say that they are talented, but a poor team?
a2: I think so, they are great players, but can't play together as a team.
a3: They failed to make it out of the group at the world cup.
q4: What place was Germany in the world cup?
q5: Who is the best player on the Germany team?
a5: I think the goalkeeper, multi-talented Manuel Neuer.
